text: Unn kay liye hameshgi wali jannaten hain inn kay neechay nehren jari hongi wahan yeh soney kay kangan pehnayen jayen gay aur sabz rang kay narm-o-bareek aur motay resham kay libas pehnen gay wahan takhton kay upper takiye lagaye huye hongay. Kiya khoob badla hai aur kiss qadar umdah aaram gaah hai
